title: The approving/sanctioning authority for the building plans under the CDS shall be the Municipal Commissioner as per the MMC Act and MRTP Act, 1966 even if the CDS partly consists of declared slums/slums on Municipal/ Govt
clause_text: The approving/sanctioning authority for the building plans under the CDS shall be the Municipal Commissioner as per the MMC Act and MRTP Act, 1966 even if the CDS partly consists of declared slums/slums on Municipal/ Govt. lands existing prior to 1st January 2000 or such/other reference date notified by the Government.
section: Relaxation in Building and other requirements:
